Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman returned to the side and top-scored with 81
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam’s side ended their four-match losing streak with the win
Bangladesh captain Shakib al-Hasan was one of three batters to get a solid start but didn’t go on
Miscellaneous Highlights: This blog is now closed. Thanks for joining us

Others: Miraz a highlight with three wickets but Mahmudullah fell just after his fifty, while Das and Shakib fell in the 40s
